casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. CARTER
v.
ALLEN CTY. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS 2019-0794 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 21, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

O'Connor, C.J., and Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, Donnelly, and Stewart, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISION WITHOUT OPINION

On respondent Judge Terri Kohlrieser's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed.
